name: Beyond (itch) (Murrri)
description:
project made in 4 Days for Global game jam 2022

(story)

You where killed and your wife was abducted by Evil Priest that rules ower the land, but you did not quite died. Death it self Resurrected you, as it turns out the Evil Priest practiced black magic and Sold his Soul to Devil, Priest death is long overdue and Death him self can't do nothing about it, which angers ancient diety. he offers you a chance for revenge and a deal, if you find a way to kill the priest, he will bring back you to life, but until then you will be stuck between worlds, neither dead nor alive, allowing you to exit your body as a spirit.

credits:
Unity Engine

Programing, Graphic

Murrri
